channel.title: docker on Gagandeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Gagandeep Singh

item.title: Docker - useful commands
item.description: To run a container using an image docker run <image name> example: docker run hello-world Override the default command for a container docker run <image name> command example: docker run busybox ls Show running containers docker ps docker ps --all This will list all the containers that were ever created on your machine. Restart stopped containers docker start <container id> example: run docker ps –all to get the list of containers
